message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this product at the price of $1,350,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its immense value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is truly exceptional.  I could consider coming down to $1,275,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product has exceptional value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,225,000. This is my final counteroffer.
